dict.acceptation: 总经理；行政部门；[计算机]执行指令；
执行的；管理的；政府部门的；

sent.orig: Appraisal of project executive includes appraisal of executive element and appraisal of executive effect.
sent.trans: 项目执行的评价包括执行要素的评价和执行效果的评价。

sent.orig: The Executive Council is an organ for assisting the Chief Executive in policy-making.
sent.trans: 行政会议是协助行政长官决策的机构。

sent.orig: An executive order is a directive from the President to other officials in the executive branch.
sent.trans: 行政命令是行政机构中总统对其他官员的指示。

sent.orig: Executive Floor guests will enjoy additional benefits like free afternoon tea in the Executive Lounge.
sent.trans: 行政楼贵宾可享受免费下午茶等多项额外超值服务。

sent.orig: Ideology, organization situation and executive system can influence the executive ability of the political party.
sent.trans: 执政党的意识形态、组织状况、执政体制等都会对一定政党的执政能力发生影响。
